name: PMPong
description:
I bought myself a Surface Book before going on vacation and told myself I'd use it to mess around in Construct 3. Made this during the flight back to keep myself honest.

This is a Pong game, except:

  • you have more inertia than you usually do in Pong games,
  • you can tap up or down right before connecting to add up/down speed, and
  • you can bounce off the walls.

Controls:

WS for left player

P; for right player.

or just touch the screen quadrants.

Enjoy!

--patrick miller
